net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation.Validator

  • Packages that use Validator 
    Package Description
    net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component
    This package is for primitive components.
    net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.composite.editor
    Classes to help implement property editor patterns.
    net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.locale
    Provides an internationalization framework for MIWT.
    net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation
    This package contains classes related to component validation.

      Classes in net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation that implement Validator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractValidator
      Abstract implementation of validator.
      class  CompositeValidator
      A validator based on the validation of one or more other validator instances.
      class  DoubleEntryValidator
      Validates DoubleEntryField's fields.
      class  DoubleRangeValidator
      Validates an text input that it is a valid double and in a range of values.
      class  DoubleValidator
      Validator for FieldComponents that hold double values.
      class  EmailValidator
      Validates email in a Field.
      class  FixedRegularExpressionValidator
      Base class for validators that always use the same pattern.
      class  FloatValidator
      Validator for FieldComponents that hold float values.
      class  IntegerValidator
      Validator for FieldComponents that hold integer values.
      class  LongRangeValidator
      Validates an text input that it is a valid long and in a range of values.
      class  LongValidator
      Validator for FieldComponents that hold long values.
      class  NumberValidator
      Abstract validator for FieldComponents in which a Number is entered.
      class  PassAllValidator
      A validator instance that always returns valid.
      class  RegularExpressionValidator
      Validates a component based on a regular expression.
      class  RequiredValueValidator
      Validates that a value is required.
      class  StringValueValidator
      A base class for validators that use a String value for validation.
      class  ValidMarkupValidator
      Markup validator that uses a MarkupValidatorClient.
      class  ValidRegularExpressionValidator
      Validates that the String is a valid RegularExpression.
      class  ValidURIValidator
      Validates that the String is a valid URI.
      class  ValidURLValidator
      Validates that the String is a valid URL.
      class  XMLFragmentMIWTValidator
      Validator for XML fragments.
